Advanced.Enable duplicate page submissions: Yes - Enable page to be re-posted

Source.SQL Query:
select p.page_id, p.page_name, p.component_name, p.plsql_code_vc2
from av_plsql_v p
where instr(upper(p.plsql_code_clob), 'APEX_UTIL.STRING_TO_TABLE') > 0
and p.application_id = :P0_APP_ID

Pagination.Type: Row Ranges X to Y (with next and previous links)

Messages.When No Data Found: No APEX_UTIL.STRING_TO_TABLE is used.

Source.SQL Query:
select p.page_id, p.page_name, p.component_name, p.plsql_code_vc2
from av_plsql_v p
where instr(upper(p.plsql_code_clob), 'APEX_UTIL.TABLE_TO_STRING') > 0
and p.application_id = :P0_APP_ID

Pagination.Type: Row Ranges X to Y (with next and previous links)

Messages.When No Data Found: No APEX_UTIL.TABLE_TO_STRING is used.

Source.SQL Query:
select p.page_id, p.page_name, p.component_name, p.plsql_code_vc2
from av_plsql_v p
where instr(upper(p.plsql_code_clob), 'APEX_PAGE.IS_JQM_SMARTPHONE_UI') > 0
and p.application_id = :P0_APP_ID

Pagination.Type: Row Ranges X to Y (with next and previous links)

Messages.When No Data Found: No APEX_PAGE.IS_JQM_SMARTPHONE_UI is used.

Source.SQL Query:
select j.page_id
      ,j.page_name
      ,j.component_name
      ,j.component_type
      ,j.js_code_vc2
from av_javascript_v j
where (instr(lower(j.js_code_vc2)
           ,'openmodal') > 0
or instr(lower(j.js_code_vc2)
       ,'closemodal') > 0)
and application_id = :P0_APP_ID

Header and Footer.Header Text:
Deprecated in APEX 20.1 and now desupported.
openModal('myRegionId'); => apex.theme.openRegion('myRegionId'); APEX 20.2 JS API apex.theme.openRegion
closeModal('myRegionId'); => apex.theme.closeRegion('myRegionId'); APEX 20.2 JS API apex.theme.closeRegion

Pagination.Type: Row Ranges X to Y (no pagination)

Messages.When No Data Found: no openModal or closeModal used

Source.SQL Query:
select 
 r.page_id
,r.page_name
,r.region_name 
from apex_application_page_regions r
where r.source_type = 'Tabular Form'
and r.application_id = :P0_APP_ID

Header and Footer.Header Text: Tabular Forms where Deprecated in APEX 20.1 and now Desupported.

Pagination.Type: Row Ranges X to Y (no pagination)

Messages.When No Data Found: no Tabular Forms used

Source.SQL Query:
select j.page_id
      ,j.page_name
      ,j.component_name
      ,j.component_type
      ,j.js_code_vc2
from av_javascript_v j
where regexp_like(j.js_code_vc2
                 ,'apex.event.trigger.*apexrefresh'
                 ,'i')
and j.application_id = :P0_APP_ID

Header and Footer.Header Text: This Event has been deprecated since APEX 20.1 and is now desupported.

Pagination.Type: Row Ranges X to Y (with next and previous links)

Messages.When No Data Found: No apex.event.trigger( "#myRegionStaticID", "apexrefresh" ) is used.

Identification.Title: 7.1.1 Theme Style "Vista" Desupported in Universal Theme

Source.SQL Query:
select ts.name, is_current
from apex_application_theme_styles ts
where ts.application_id = :P0_APP_ID
and ts.name = 'Vista'
and ts.is_current = 'Yes'

Pagination.Type: Row Ranges X to Y (no pagination)

Messages.When No Data Found: No Theme Style Vista is used.

Source.SQL Query:
select j.page_id
      ,j.page_name
      ,j.component_name
      ,j.component_type
      ,j.js_code_vc2
from av_javascript_v j
where instr(j.js_code_clob
           ,'.afterModify') > 0
and j.application_id = :P0_APP_ID

Pagination.Type: Row Ranges X to Y (no pagination)

Messages.When No Data Found: No calls like apex.item("P1_ITEM").afterModify() found.
